website_summaries.verdict: The instructions aren't as clear as we'd like, but the hardware is solid and easy to install. The two 5-foot bars are ideal for room dividing.
pros: Wide enough to support larger doors
Users praise the near-perfect door alignment
cons: Included bolts may be too long for standard doors
Uses two 5-foot bars, not one solid piece
Instructions are minimal pictograms with metric measurements

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality. We used the track for our bedroom closet. It came with all the pieces and is heavy duty. It turned out great and the doors slide very smoothly on the track.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Ahlschlager

customer_reviews.title: Great hardware, Great Value, Great Service!
customer_reviews.text: This hardware is very attractive and sturdy, and is priced well below other kits we investigated. It is tough to find bypass hardware like this for such a large opening--this works great. The doors glide with ease. Two of the stops were missing from the package when it arrived. We contacted the seller, who IMMEDIATELY Fed-X'd us the two missing parts, and we are very happy with both the product and the service we received.
customer_reviews.author: MLH

customer_reviews.title: This was a brilliant purchse. It's heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: I hung barn doors over our kitchen pantry. Not one person has failed to comment on them. This was a brilliant purchse. It's heavy duty, and while a little complicated to hang, not overly difficult. Mainly it's repetitive and time consuming. They slide well without sticking, they're easy to move. I really love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Sue

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, just terrible directions and drywall mounts.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I am only giving it 3 stars is because the instructions were lacking. It was all pictures, but not even close to the clarity of Ikea's picture instructions. Overall, it wasn't that difficult, just the instructions were frustrating at first. The product itself is perfect! It looks great and is very high quality. Oh, one other downfall was the drywall mounts. The bolts provided did not fit the drywall mounts that were included. I ended up just mounting a 2x4 into the studs and then mounted the rail to the 2x4. I felt more secure doing it that way anyhow, as the rail and doors are rather heavy.
customer_reviews.author: veroneeeeca

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Highly suggest using a header and not going into studs on drywall. Need a partner and a level:)
customer_reviews.author: Ben Ireland

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Solution
customer_reviews.text: We are building a small cabin with a guest/dining area. We needed to install doors for privacy but didn't have room for swinging doors. We wanted an opening larger enough to appear to be one room with the doors open. This hardware worked perfectly. Wide enough to create a spacious look, beefy enough to hold two 9' solid 2" thick wood doors. The doors roll very smoothly. The hardest part was getting the rail perfectly level (because there are 2 parts that join in the middle) and adjusting the stops at the perfect place. Only took a few hours drilling & assembly
customer_reviews.author: Mamabum

customer_reviews.title: Shorty
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good shape, all parts in the box. Filled the directions for putting on the wall and was very sturdy. But the math was off, putting up 80" doors and installed rails at 80" + the 1-1/2"... Predrilled the holes in my doors and it was way too short. Leaned out at a 15deg angle. Put doors up to rails and there was barely enough room to get them on maybe a 1/4" gap. Well they won't fall of at any rate. But I could put a threshold under them like I wanted. So check the measurements but they work well
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Webb

customer_reviews.title: Good hardware, had to re-engineer the upper brackets
customer_reviews.text: Good hardware, had to re-engineer the upper brackets. But it all worked. If you flip the second rail brackets upside down it takes up less wall space, and gives you something to fasten into. Like everyone else said, the plastic anchors for the lag bolts are complete garbage. Find a stud or a header to bolt into.
customer_reviews.author: Boon

customer_reviews.title: The hardware is great!
customer_reviews.text: The hardware is wonderful so it gets 5 stars. The directions are horrible...but I had read a bunch of reviews and knew what to do and look for. All the measurements are metric and some are not right. Lay this whole thing out before you start drilling into your wall.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The set is just fantastic. Everything is perfectly aligned and is in great quality, I love how it looks on my wall. Installation instruction may be a little bit more detailed but we were able to figure it all out. Included bolts are a bit too long for a standard 1.375'' door so we had to use some extra washers
customer_reviews.author: AlexP

customer_reviews.title: Solid hardware
customer_reviews.text: The hardware is solid and easy to install. My door was DIY so was not a standard size. The screws that came with the package are bit too long so I went to Home Depot and replaced them with same size but smaller in length. I’ve also spray painted them black.
customer_reviews.author: JasbirS

customer_reviews.title: The one thing I can say is that the installation instructions are pretty much useless
customer_reviews.text: Very solid constructed piece. I used it for a 5ft barn door I made and it is holding it quite well. The one thing I can say is that the installation instructions are pretty much useless. The seller took longer than expected to get it to my door so when I contacted them about it, the package was lost and they expedited a new delivery within a couple of days. Overall a good purchase but you should not rely on the instructions to get you through the install.
customer_reviews.author: T.H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Track
customer_reviews.text: Love this track...used on a set of 32" x 50" barn door style window covers. Pretty straight forward to install, read instructions, but basically sat down and pulled out all the pieces and put it together. Used a header to attach it to the wall which adds to the overall appearance. This size does need two people to install.
customer_reviews.author: RiverRunRusticWoodCrafts

customer_reviews.title: Great price for what you get
customer_reviews.text: Does its job if you can figure out how to put it together. Does not come with proper instructions so it made it more difficult to put together. Some of the parts included werent right for the kit so we had to go buy different bolts and washers. Ultimately it turned out great after we adjusted a few things. Great price and great shipping. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: They look great!
customer_reviews.text: They look good, but when we were installing them, the bolts kept breaking off when we hit a stud in the wall. We finally had to go to the store and buy stronger bolts to make it work. Some of the bolts were not in studs, so they worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Suzi

customer_reviews.title: ok BUT NO
customer_reviews.text: Pros 1. Price is good. 2. Overall Quality. Cons 1.Install instructions are terrible. 2.My main complaint is that there is NO adjustment for leveling. You CANNOT adjust these after install at all, you must install everything 100% perfect within 1/32” or they do not function properly. Adding a small adjustment screw on the wheel is all this needs to go from 2 stars to 5.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan M.

customer_reviews.title: Instructions are lacking steps and details
customer_reviews.text: Metal Hardware was well. The plastic wall hangers are worthless. The instructions were the most worthless, poorly written thing I've seen. I had to plot and reconfigure for it to all work properly. Once done, I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: trol1374

customer_reviews.title: Easy glide.
customer_reviews.text: The price was great for bypass. The look good installed and move with unbelievable ease. We have very large closet doors which were specially built for us and had to have the bypass tracks. I will recommend to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bold barn door track.
customer_reviews.text: Two ways to install, but only received directions for one. We pulled shorter install info from online which only read 7 inch clearance. Track strong and bold. Recd numerous compliments from guests.
customer_reviews.author: Walkman172

customer_reviews.title: Instructions were vague but nice heavy duty kit
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty rollers ,track ,and lag bolts. The plastic anchors I thought were a little cheesy so I went and bought lag shields. Probably overkill. Instructions were vague but nice heavy duty kit. Built my own doors see pic.
customer_reviews.author: Brad F

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, great for a laundry nook in a house we are renovating
customer_reviews.author: Gwharton

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Used for a closet and bathroom door configuration where both doors must slide to middle to be opened. This worked great. No bump when doors slide over middle where the two bars connect.
customer_reviews.author: -Brandi Thorwarth-

customer_reviews.title: Great value, nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Used this for an oversized custom made barn door. The hardware is very good quality and finish. Very easy to install, and looks great! Highly recommend. Shipping was fast.
customer_reviews.author: lazer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product. Happy with end results.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a quality product but the directions were not very good. Thank goodness I know a little about hanging barn doors. I would have rather had one solid 11’ rail than the two 5 1/2’ pieces with a joiner clamp in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: MichMan1957

customer_reviews.title: like it.
customer_reviews.text: like it...sad that is was missing parts-(screws and nuts)....and the Hollow wall anchors are completely worthless as the second you try to drive the screw in the anchor just spins around...and nothing like missing instructions
customer_reviews.author: tink

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and would be nice to have more link sizes. Like just a little shorter.
customer_reviews.author: Donna D

customer_reviews.title: These work great.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second purchase of these. Work flakes both times. Ceiling mount into drywall.
customer_reviews.author: rbw

customer_reviews.title: It's Barn Door-riffic!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It worked just as I expected. One note...since its 8 ft wide, whatever you hang is going to be big & heavy. Make sure you have 2 levels of wall studs for anchor. Usually the door frame will work for the lower rail, but for the upper rail be prepared. The bolts provided were way too big for the plastic anchors provided...and you really need good anchoring. I ended up buying anchor bolts with the "spring open" wing nuts and the worked fine against the sheet rock. I really only needed 3 of those since I also hit 3 studs with bolts while anchoring the top side.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Dog

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Much less than the big box store price and seems pretty straightforward as far as installation. Free shipping, thank heavens, since it weighs a ton!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!! Great deal!!
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy, well made product. Exactly what we needed for a fantastic price. As it’s very heavy, and installation is tricky, make sure you have two, if not three people. Gorgeous when up and works great. Would recommend to others!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice hardware. Instructions stink but most do... pretty decent set. Definitely doing what they what they’re meant to do.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Schuck

customer_reviews.title: Instructions to install suck.
customer_reviews.text: Instructions suck.3/5 inch 7/10 inch help in fast an mostly ok. If purchase is in USA instructions are piss poor.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C.

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great price, exactly what we wanted for our interior barn doors
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong bracket
customer_reviews.text: One bracket that is used for the outer bypass track had the wrong holes, other then that the track works well. Ill appretiate if I can have a replacement bracket to complete my track.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Terrible instructions but good quality
customer_reviews.text: This track is really nice but the instructions are terrible. There are no words and the pictures skip steps. We eventually figured it out but it took a long time. The metal is high quality and the track is super smooth.
customer_reviews.author: J. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need minus the doors and the handles. Pretty way instructions to follow although metric. The bolts for the door were too long so I had to buy a few different nuts but not a huge deal. After a ton of research I was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: elisa manwaring

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful rustic look
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and rustic look. Very happy with this purchase. Doors look beautiful with this product. Would recommend this to anyone looking for a rustic appeal!
customer_reviews.author: Eva1

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and I would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: this product met my needs. Good quality and I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Cal

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: It did not come with all the parts. I have to send it back. Reorder and hope it comes with all the parts the second time. Waste of time and energy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: we used them on our closet doors worked out great thanks
customer_reviews.author: lynn

customer_reviews.title: Son-in-law scores points for installing double rustic rail for rolling utility doors for mother-in-law
customer_reviews.text: No one could ask for a better made product. My mother-in-law is very happy. Her new rolling doors are the hit of her neighborhood.
customer_reviews.author: Paw Paw

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in this item
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this item. The pieces I did get were fine; however, the package was missing half the hardware and it was a hassle to get any response to have the items replaced. I ended up purchasing in some of the hardware separately (paying for it again!). Lesson learned
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Easy Installation but requires two people
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. It made such a beautiful door and was a huge selling point when we sold our house last month.
customer_reviews.author: Peg

customer_reviews.title: Looks and operates great
customer_reviews.text: Installation went well and the installed doors look great. Yes I had to realize that the directions alternated between two different styles of English writing and I had to do some conversion. In the end I give this good review.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Lawler

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for barn door style shutters. Easy enough to install. The predrilled holes in the bar are great IF your studs are exactly 16" apart AND your door or window is dead center with a stud. We ended up using a board secured to the wall and securing the rail to that. Wife is very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Check your packages promptly!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't open my package upon delivery because construction had been delayed where these were going to be used. Just opened it today and there were NO BRACKETS in the box! To late for any redemption now.
customer_reviews.author: Babs4Fun!

customer_reviews.title: Quality product for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm. Box was pretty roughed up from shipping but it shipped from china so I guess that's to be expected. Product functions just great.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher gullickson

customer_reviews.title: Love my barn doors!
customer_reviews.text: This kit is great! I just got my doors hung today, and I have to say that I am thoroughly impressed! I had my doors custom made because I have a small doorway I was installing them. It worked out great and the kit was everything I expected it to be. You do need a few tools, but nothing super difficult to find in the garage or borrow from a friend. I had a friend of mine install the tracks and doors after he built them and he said it was fairly easy, even though the instructions have nothing but pictures. Great buy and I would definitely buy another in the future for other projects.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Bolts for the track are the right length for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Bolts for the track are the right length for a single track but not long enough for double bypass. Off to the store to spend more money for an incomplete kit. Poorly designed overpriced
customer_reviews.author: snipermp169

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made, don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Connector on ten foot model interferes with the carriage. The instruction dimensions were way off. It caused re-work and problems. Don't duy this brand
customer_reviews.author: wood-pro

customer_reviews.title: My husband and I did this entire project and it came out Great..
customer_reviews.text: This worked GREAAT!! My husband and I did this entire project and it came out Great...My friends are impressed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: B. Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product and Reasonable price - Would by again
customer_reviews.text: product as described, very pleased and would buy it again great price. My wife is happy.. and we all know that if the wife is happy......... - you get good reviews
customer_reviews.author: William M

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good product.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, pretty good. Some holes could have lined up better but I'm pleased with final looks.
customer_reviews.author: Clackamas

customer_reviews.title: Good system but.....
customer_reviews.text: goos product but the instructions are not useful at all. One kit was missing some bolts. Packaging was not damaged in delivery
customer_reviews.author: Joe m.

customer_reviews.title: Instructions are almost nonexistent, and the bolts are too ...
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are almost nonexistent, and the bolts are too long for the pieces. But once you figure it out on your own, and buy some replacement bolts, it all works.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed or our remodel. Looks great. Have received many compliments on our doors.
customer_reviews.author: J Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The track works great after a couple of weeks. I recommend a soft close if you can find it!
customer_reviews.author: Hal Wallis

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Update - after receiving the correct hardware, it truly is very well made. Worth the delivery hassle? For the price I suppose so. Did not receive all of the parts as described.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Crowton

customer_reviews.title: but it looked pretty easy. I love the look on my large ...
customer_reviews.text: I had someone install them, but it looked pretty easy. I love the look on my large front window.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: And works beautifully.
customer_reviews.text: We are using as a closet door - Built two 4 foot cedar doors. It is lovely! And works beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Giving it a 4 stare because the two piece bar creates alignment problems. Should be a solid bar. Otherwise it is a nice product and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Scott vedder

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Directions were extremely difficult to understand. Should be easier to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just right for a double door
customer_reviews.text: Just what was needed to make a double barn door
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing hardware but good quality otherwise!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for. I was prepared for the the direction to be difficult to interpret (see S to be the norm these days). I was disappointed that I had to drive 90 miles round trip to go to Home Depot looking for replacements for the 6 missing Nuts and bolts. They didn't have the matching black ones which you can see in the picture. Ah well, it works well now and seems to be fairly heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Colette Hirata

customer_reviews.title: Extremely well made!! Worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended!! Definitely a 2 person job. I was a little nervous about the look hoping it was what I was looking for - not to modern- Its perfect! Also fast shipping ( earlier than expected). I'm a huge review person, so I will only write one unless I'm happy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Texas five

customer_reviews.title: Instructions terrible
customer_reviews.text: The product is of good quality, however instructions were terrible. Just a few pictures. We tried to youtube it but had a difficult time assembling. I guess unless you are an experienced door installer you have to guess how to put this together.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Barn Door Hardware
customer_reviews.text: The product was exactly as described. One of the two 5ft tracks sent was initially missing some pre-drilled holes. Seller responded to me same day on a weekend and shipped a replacement piece shortly afterward. Hardware looks great, can't beat the price. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice hardware. Instructions in metric but OK. Looks really good and slides smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fix the instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Measurements are metric and instructions leave a lot to be desired. Quality of product is good.
customer_reviews.author: Jim K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, and was easy to install! very impressed with this.
customer_reviews.author: Dan P

customer_reviews.title: Great product easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Great product easy to install !! I highly recommend !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Instructions aren’t great, but product is great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Adri

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and very nice looking. Very pleased with it
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Rabideau

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase,. It is well made and works great! We have nothing but compliments on this piece.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Sanford

customer_reviews.title: Main support rod (8') could have been a little more ...
customer_reviews.text: Main support rod (8') could have been a little more heavy duty as it wanted to deflect under it's own weight. All other hardware worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Fred N.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great and extreme easy to install.. Instructions not the best but easy anyway
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product and worked well with my custom doors. So happy I went with this supplier.
customer_reviews.author: Dekovan Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. heavy gauge construction and was sturdy after installing.
customer_reviews.author: phillip cross

customer_reviews.title: Poor design and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the quality of some of the hardware,all of the black paint is coming off the bolts and the floor guide is turning out to be a big pain in the ass having to have the doors routed.they need to provide a simple guide that rides on either side of the doors.Now I have to shop for some suitable guides or find someone to router the bottom of each door.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I ordered 2 of these for a friend who is ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these for a friend who is building a cabin. I had to send one back immediately because the box was torn and all the hardware was missing. Ordered a replacement so that made three in all. Out of all three, there was something missing, screws, bolts etc from every one.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa G  Moss

customer_reviews.title: Its easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Its exactly what we had hoped. Its easy to install. The directions are in metric and have just pictures, so you have to have a little knowledge of what your doing. Its beautiful and works great. The company that sells this is great also I needed a set of instructions, emailed them and had them the same day, not what I expected. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: very good product, unfortunately directions page is very unclear (we ...
customer_reviews.text: very good product, unfortunately directions page is very unclear (we ended up mounting the door 1/2'' too high). Lucky for me we had ordered another type that had very similar directions, so although the doors are too high for the "t" guide they are still level, beautiful, and glide effortlessly.
customer_reviews.author: michael buss

customer_reviews.title: Good Price Good Product
customer_reviews.text: These worked great. I used them for sliding doors in the master bedroom. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: DJ in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Would be 5 stars except..
customer_reviews.text: I would give this a full five stars if the instructions included with the kit were more useful. It is primarily pictures and not very good ones at that. Otherwise the hardware works great and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: S.H.

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy hardware
customer_reviews.text: Holy costumer service!!!! They were great and very speedy with their response times! There were a couple mistakes with parts (1 white roller when I ordered black rollers and recieven 12/16 spacers) but they made up for it with fast shipping and response times! We had to restructure/costumize the hardware a little bit to fit our low ceilings and reinforce the three doors but works great and holding up well!
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated installer
customer_reviews.text: Product has terrible instructions does not tell you which way to flip the bars. Does not explain to you that it's only designed for one thickness of the door..doesn't have the ability to fit thinner doors without retrofitting. The guides to the door are ridiculous unless you happen to own a router and know how to use it..product quality itself is fine.. luckily I remodel homes so I was able to make it work without redoing it numerous times.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Very nice barn door hanger
customer_reviews.text: Very nice barn door hanger. Well built. The only down side is that the direction aren't clear. They are missing a few steps. I would still buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Hardware sucks, comes with a drywall anchors that aren't made well enough and just spin in the drywall when trying to tighten. Didn't come with enough washers, I have seen better instructions from IKEA junk.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie H.

customer_reviews.title: Needs better drywall anchors
customer_reviews.text: The barn door kit was awesome except the anchors they supply to go in the drywall are useless and don’t work. If you are going into just wood you’ll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Shalynn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Needed to trade for a shorter one but it is on the way!!
customer_reviews.author: Marmalade

customer_reviews.title: I was pleasantly surprised when my package arrived and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised when my package arrived and I saw the quality of this product!!! Very well made!!!!! Have not yet had my carpenter install yet
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Spugnardi

customer_reviews.title: Too flimsy
customer_reviews.text: My installer refused to install this item saying it wouldn't support my barn doors. He said it was too cheaply made
customer_reviews.author: A. Bonneau

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It looks great! But the directions were not very clear.
customer_reviews.author: Brett A Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Great service, great price
customer_reviews.text: I have only purchased this hardware and have not yet installed it. I love that I was able to purchase an odd size (10 ft) and at such a great price. We did not find installation instructions with the package, so I emailed the company and they got back to me the same day!! Great Service!! The color is flat black, just as I'd hoped and the construction seems good and hardy. Can't wait to install!!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: do not buy this unit the wall hangers do not even screw together the project has become a nightmare!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: DIYHD MM20D 10FT Rustic Black Double Sliding Barn Door Hardware
feature_bullets: 10FT is track's length had been pre-drilled 16" apart holes
Two rollers can bear MAX weight 90kgs,suitable for door thickness 35-40mm

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars217 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
